title.narrative: Next step for Youth for Sustainable Change

description.narrative: The aim of this project is to formulate a new partnership strategy for the long- standing partnership between DSU and AY. After two 3 yearlong successful partnership projects the partnership needs to reformulate itself and onboard new volunteers that can come with new ideas and insights on how to further strengthen and develop the partnership. Furthermore, the partnership development project will help kickstart the engagement from both partners after a long period during COVID where activities have been carried out in the Philippines only and with only participation from the Danish project team from the distance. The activities of the project include an orientation to the new project team members, a meeting among previous youth leaders, visits to local government and party leaders and a visit to the project areas. The target groups for this project are the Danish and Philippine project team members and local project teams in the Philippines.
